title: Pixel 5 - Selection of Homescreen
content:
Hello together,
Is there a way to individually choose which Page is your Homescreen? I need 5 "Homescreen" pages (with Widgets etc.) and want to have the "Startscreen" right in the middle. Any important apps, only 2 swipes away from the startscreen. With the current design the "Startscreen" is alwas on the far far left. So i need to swipe right, swipe right, swipe right, swipe right to get to last page..... Really annoying. Is there any solution?
